articles.author: Kendall Baker
articles.title: The NFL is taking over Christmas
articles.description: Football is stealing basketball's holiday thunder.
articles.content:
For years, the NFL had Thanksgiving and the NBA had Christmas. Now, the NFL is coming down the chimney and stealing the NBA's milk and cookies.
